data.name: Kate Bishop
data.description: Kate Bishop's already impressive archery is made even more devastating with the addition of Hawkeye's Trick Arrows. Stubborn and a bit reckless, she's the perfect leader for the Young Avengers.

starItems.name: Kate Bishop
starItems.description: Kate Bishop's already impressive archery is made even more devastating with the addition of Hawkeye's Trick Arrows. Stubborn and a bit reckless, she's the perfect leader for the Young Avengers.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing to primary target
On Crit, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>125%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>125%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

On Crit, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>125%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

On Crit, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> random positive effect.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>175%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects.

On Crit, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent target for <color=#86e619>175%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to each target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>225%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects.

On Crit, Chain to <color=#86e619>1</color> adjacent enemy for <color=#86e619>225%</color> Piercing + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> random positive effects.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> to each target.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance for this attack.
This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on each target to a negative effect

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on each target to a negative effect.

If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>75%</color>

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage. Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect on each target to a negative effect.

If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>75%</color> + gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on each target to negative effects

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage. Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on each target to negative effects.

If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>75%</color> + gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on each target to negative effects.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>75%</color> + gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on each target to negative effects

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>225%</color> damage. Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on each target to negative effects.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>75%</color> + gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>275%</color> damage. Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on each target to negative effects.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

If this character does not have <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>75%</color> + gain <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage and <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect to all other enemies from this list: <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Don't lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage and <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect to all other enemies from this list: <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Don't lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage and <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect to all other enemies from this list: <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Don't lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to all enemies
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>210%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage and <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect to all other enemies from this list: <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Don't lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects to all other enemies

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the enemy with the highest Damage and <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects to all other enemies from this list: <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Don't lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the enemy with the highest Damage
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all other enemies

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the enemy with the highest Damage and <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all other enemies from this list: <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Don't lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to all enemies
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the enemy with the highest Damage and <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all other enemies from this list: <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>, <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>, <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

Lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Don't lose <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

This attack cannot be dodged or counterattacked.

1.description:
On Death of a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally or when a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, attack a random enemy for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to a random enemy
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies

2.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

On Death of a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally or when a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, attack a random enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to a random enemy
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance
<color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance

3.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

On Death of a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally or when a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, attack a random enemy for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.
3.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, gain <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, on Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> Charged

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

On Death of a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally or when a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, attack a random enemy for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.
 > On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to a random enemy
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies.

On Death of a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally or when a <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, attack a random enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > Gain <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on Spawn of their initial match. This action occurs only once per <color=#fff568>WAR</color>.
 > On Turn, if <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, grant <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy to self and all <color=#fff568>YOUNG AVENGER</color> allies, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
